doc:
Ally Sheedy https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ally_Sheedy 0 Alexandra Elizabeth "Ally" Sheedy (born June 13, 1962) is an American actress and author. Following her film debut in 1983's Bad Boys, she became known as one of the Brat Pack group of actors in the films The Breakfast Club (1985) and St. Elmo's Fire (1985). She also acted in WarGames (1983) and Short Circuit (1986). For her performance in Lisa Cholodenko's High Art (1998), Sheedy won the Independent Spirit Award for Best Female Lead. Alexandra_Elizabeth_"_Ally_"_Sheedy ( born June_13_,_1962 ) is an_American_actress_and_author . Following her_film_debut in 1983 's_Bad_Boys , she became_known as one of the_Brat Pack group of actors in the_films The_Breakfast_Club_(_1985_) and St._Elmo 's_Fire_(_1985_) . She also acted in WarGames ( 1983 ) and Short_Circuit_(_1986_) . For her_performance in Lisa_Cholodenko 's_High_Art_(_1998_) , Sheedy won the_Independent_Spirit_Award for Best_Female_Lead .
